mainPage.workText:
Our clients include major financial groups, retailers, global pharmaceutical companies.

Our team is able to understand the customer’s sphere at the expert level: this is the only way to guarantee the quality of the project.

We think beyond the brief and strive to do more than the client expects.

workPage.text: In 12 years, we have come up with a lot of concepts for corporate and mass events, and we have fully implemented them. Our studio provided a full cycle of services in organization, cohesive work of staff, technical equipment and development of sites, catering and accompanying artists. And clients could enjoy the result.

studioPage.subtitle: We believe that every event happens only once, and we must make this experience unique.
studioPage.title: Mad Band is a studio that combines creativity, pleasure, provocation, innovation and quality.
studioPage.text: Our team knows how to understand the product and the customer's task at the expert level, this is the only way to guarantee the high-quality implementation of the project. MadBand combines creativity with responsibility and open communication. We think beyond the scope of the brief and strive to do more than the client expects.

mission.label: Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to help you to create meanings that will inspire people and enjoy working together on creative projects with an ambitious and bright idea.

philosophy.label: Philosophy
philosophy.text: Our philosophy is to make beautiful events that affect all senses and the mind of the audience, and invest in them.
philosophy.bigText: It is important for us to make your event or product not only beautiful, but also inspiring.
